name: movies_get_upcoming
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool flixster.
Tool description: This API helps to query for movies, actors, theaters, showtime, etc... to create a site/application, such as : rottentomatoes.com, flixster.com
API description: Fetches a list of upcoming movies based on the specified parameters.

limit.description: The number of items to return, with a maximum of 100. Defaults to 100.
